sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { X, Bed, Users, Wifi, Coffee, Dumbbell, Car, Phone, MessageSquare, Mail, Clock, Calendar, User, MapPin, ArrowLeft, ArrowRight, Edit, Trash2 } from 'lucide-react'; import { Button } from './ui/button'; import { Dialog, DialogContent, DialogHeader, DialogTitle } from './ui/dialog'; interface RoomDetailsModalProps { isOpen: boolean; onClose: () => void; room: { id: string; number: string; type: string; status: 'available' | 'occupied' | 'maintenance' | 'cleaning'; floor: number; guestName?: string; checkIn?: string; checkOut?: string; phone?: string; email?: string; notes?: string; amenities: string[]; }; } const RoomDetailsModal: React.FC = ({ isOpen, onClose, room }) => { const statusColors = { available: 'bg-green-100 text-green-800', occupied: 'bg-red-100 text-red-800', maintenance: 'bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800', cleaning: 'bg-blue-100 text-blue-800' }; const statusText = { available: 'Available', occupied: 'Occupied', maintenance: 'Maintenance', cleaning: 'Cleaning' }; return (
Room {room.number}
{statusText[room.status]} Floor {room.floor} ‚Ä¢ {room.type} Room
{/* Left Column - Room Info */}
{/* Room Image */}
Room {room.number} image
{/* Guest Information */} {room.status === 'occupied' && room.guestName && (

Guest Information

Guest Name

{room.guestName}

Phone

{room.phone || 'N/A'}

Email

{room.email || 'N/A'}

Notes

{room.notes || 'No special requests'}

)} {/* Room Details */}

Room Details

Room Type

{room.type}

Floor

{room.floor}

Room Number

{room.number}

Status

{statusText[room.status]}
{/* Amenities */}

Amenities

{room.amenities.map((amenity, index) => ( {amenity === 'wifi' && } {amenity === 'coffee' && } {amenity === 'gym' && } {amenity === 'parking' && } {amenity} ))}
{/* Right Column - Actions */}
{/* Status Card */}

Room Status

Current Status

{statusText[room.status]} {room.status === 'available' && '‚úì'} {room.status === 'occupied' && 'üë§'} {room.status === 'maintenance' && '‚öíÔ∏è'} {room.status === 'cleaning' && 'üßπ'}

Change Status

{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

{/* Booking Information */} {(room.checkIn || room.checkOut) && (

Booking Information

Check-in

{room.checkIn || 'N/A'}

Check-out

{room.checkOut || 'N/A'}

Duration

{room.checkIn && room.checkOut ? `${Math.ceil((new Date(room.checkOut).getTime() - new Date(room.checkIn).getTime()) / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24))} nights` : 'N/A'}

)}
); }; export default RoomDetailsModal;
